_description: The changes of fortune: on the impossibility of relief in love — one stanza rhyme royal

DULCosVii13.Transcription: Whan euery woo hathe easeAnd euery wysshe hys wyllwhan one thyng all men pleaseAnd euery spryng hys fyllwhan vallyes clyme the hyllthen shall my thoughtfull hartbe easyd of hys smart
DULCosVii13.Note: A third variant, in the same hand.
